name: Keep your distance (MarcoKaz, Octavius)
description:
This is a game for the ludum dare 46 game jam. The theme was "keep it alive" and we created a game in which the player must act as a virus, jumping from person to person in order to survive. 
Use WASD for move the character and aim with the mouse.

Press and hold Space to sneeze on to the next carrier
Stay with the carrier long enough to have them infected.

Credits:

Ruben Ornelas @rubenoctavius: Programming, Game Design

Marco Vale @MarcoValeKaz: Visuals, Audio
